TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/SelectedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示集合，其中含有 中選取項目的索引。

span.span: Represents the collection containing the indexes to the selected items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會儲存在選取的項目索引。The class stores the indexes to the selected items in the . 索引儲存在內的索引位置類別。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the class. 類別會儲存所有項目顯示在。The class stores all items displayed in the . 下表會如何的範例儲存的項目以及其在範例中的選取項目狀態。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states within an example . |索引Index|項目Item|在清單方塊中的選取狀態Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未選取Unselected| |11|object2object2|已選取Selected| |22|object3object3|未選取Unselected| |33|object4object4|已選取Selected| |44|object5object5|已選取Selected| 根據上表中的範例下, 表會示範如何會出現。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ObjectCollection 中的選取項目的索引Index of selected item in ObjectCollection| |-----------|------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用這個類別的方法與屬性來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否從索引位置類別是儲存在所選索引。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the class is a member of the selected indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷其中內的特定索引位置如儲存。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where a specific index position within the for the is stored. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來搜尋的搜尋文字的項目中的所有執行個體。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 此範例會使用新版方法，可讓您指定要從中執行中的所有項目持續搜尋開始的搜尋服務索引。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 此範例也示範如何判斷何時方法開始之後到達要避免的遞迴式搜尋的項目清單的底部，從清單的頂端搜尋。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 一旦項目中找到，選取使用方法。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. [!code-cpp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的索引。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷在選取的項目數目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 逐一查看集合的值時，您可以再使用此值，您必須提供執行迴圈的反覆項目的數目。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非的屬性設為`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`，這個屬性一律會傳回值為零 (0) 或一 （1） 取決於您是否有選取的項目。Unless the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來搜尋的搜尋文字的項目中的所有執行個體。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 此範例會使用新版方法，可讓您指定要從中執行中的所有項目持續搜尋開始的搜尋服務索引。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 此範例也示範如何判斷何時方法開始之後到達要避免的遞迴式搜尋的項目清單的底部，從清單的頂端搜尋。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 一旦項目中找到，選取使用方法。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. [!code-cpp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/VB/form1.vb#1)]
